author: Special Correspondent
text:
M.K. Stalin prefers the position of the secretary of the youth wing to that of party treasurer.

During an interaction with journalists, Mr. Stalin said age was not a bar for him to continue as the secretary of the youth wing.

“The age limit applies only to members of the youth wing. As far as I am concerned, I value the post of the youth wing leader over the post of treasurer,” he said.

To a question why he had not projected himself as a leader with an independent character, Mr Stalin said, “Kalaignar is the leader of the party.”
title: ‘I value youth wing leader post’
